name: NavMeshTools
author: kafeijao
description:
Simple library that allows to bake NavMeshes in Runtime.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/NavMeshTools) for more in-depth info.
changelog:
- Fixed for 2025r180
- Add baked meshes to the world cleanup, so they are destroyed when the world unloads
